text: Julius Malema is a South African Politician who serves as Leader of the Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF).https://m.news24.com/SouthAfrica/News/malema-land-court-case-postponed-20180625 | Malema land court case postponed | News24https://www.timeslive.co.za/politics/2018-06-25-julius-malema-appears-in-court-on-land-invasion-charges/ Julius Malema appears in court on land invasion chargeshttps://www.businesslive.co.za/bd/politics/2018-06-14-julius-malema-warns-of-war-if-land-issue-not-resolved/ Julius Malema warns of war if land issue not resolved == References == Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:South African politicians
